```coq
intros st h os st' m.
unfold in_output_list.
intro H.
apply in_output_list_split in H.
destruct H as [H | H].
- elimtype False.
  apply doLeader_same_log with (st:=st) (h:=h) in H.
  apply doLeader_appliedEntries with (sigma:=fun _ => st) (h:=h) in H.
  rewrite H in H0.
  apply handleClientRequest_logs_sorted with (net:= {| nwPackets := []; nwState := fun _ => st |}) (h:=h) (client:=client) (id:=id) (c:=ClientRequest client id out) in H0.
  apply RIR_doLeader with (net:= {| nwPackets := []; nwState := fun _ => st |}) (st':=st') (ps':=[]) (h:=h) (os:=os) (d':=st') (ms:=m) in H0.
  auto.
- elimtype False.
  apply doLeader_same_log with (st:=st) (h:=h) in H.
  apply doLeader_appliedEntries with (sigma:=fun _ => st) (h:=h) in H.
  rewrite H in H0.
  apply handleClientRequest_logs_sorted with (net:= {| nwPackets := []; nwState := fun _ => st |}) (h:=h) (client:=client) (id:=id) (c:=ClientRequest client id out) in H0.
  apply RIR_doLeader with (net:= {| nwPackets := []; nwState := fun _ => st |}) (st':=st') (ps':=[]) (h:=h) (os:=os) (d':=st') (ms:=m) in H0.
  auto.
Qed.
